verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Ku ada s'bab anugrah-Mu
Ku ada karena kasih-Mu
Tuhan Yesus ku berterima kasih
Buat kasih rahmat-Mu

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Ku ada s'bab anugrah-Mu
Ku ada karena kasih-Mu
Tuhan Yesus ku berterima kasih
Buat kasih rahmat-Mu

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Trima kasih Yesus
Yesus trima kasih
Hanya anugrah-Mu buat hidupku s'karang
Ku kan memuji-Mu selamanya

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
I am here because of your grace
I am here because of your love
Lord Jesus, I am so thankful
For your grace abounds to me

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Thank you Jesus, Jesus, Jesus
Thank you Jesus
It's only by your grace, that I could live today
Forever I will praise your name

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Thank you Jesus, Jesus, Jesus
Thank you Jesus
It's only by your grace, that I could live today
Forever I will praise your name

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
It's only by your grace, that I could live today
Forever I will praise your name
